attributes.action: David Cameron must reveal whether or not he is opting into or out of the internet porn censor.
attributes.additional_details: The undersigned demand that, if the government pass the bill (currently being drawn up) to apply a national internet firewall to block pornography unless the account holder actively opts out of it; David Cameron (or the incumbent Prime Minister at the time of the bill being passed) must publicly announce whether or not his (and his household's) personal and work (i.e. any internet capable device which is used by himself or others on behalf of himself, for his duties as Prime Minister; regardless of the owner of the device) devices will be opted out of the government mandated internet service provider pornography block or whether he will passively opt in to the aforementioned block on pornography at internet service provider level.

rejection.details: Not one that DCMS can answer.  Could be addressed to the PM personally.
